```{r}
# Some changes from Wicham
# embrace the pipe!
table1 %>% 
ggplot(mapping = aes(
  x = parse_date(
    as.character(year),
    format = "%Y"
    ),
  y = rate,
  colour = country
  )
  ) + 
  geom_line(mapping = aes(group = country)) + 
  geom_point() + 
  xlab("Time") +
  ylab("Rate per 100000") +
  theme(legend.position = "bottom")
```

```{r}
View(who)
```

```{r}
#| paged.print: false
tidy_who <- who %>% 
  pivot_longer(cols = -c(1:4),
               names_to = "key",
               values_to = "cases",
               values_drop_na = TRUE
               ) |> 
  arrange(country, year, key) |>
  mutate(
    key = str_replace(key, "newrel", "new_rel")
  ) |> 
  separate(col = key,
           into = c("new", "type", "sexage"),
           sep = "_"
           ) |> 
  select(-new) |> 
  separate(col = sexage,
           into = c("sex", "age"),
           sep = 1
           ) |> 
  mutate(
    age = str_replace(age, "014", "0014"),
    age = str_replace(age, "65", "6599")
  ) |> 
  separate(col = age,
           into = c("age_start", "age_end"),
           sep = 2
           ) |> 
  select(-iso2, -iso3) |> 
  rename(met_diag = type)
```
